publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-4221 Linda Fabiani on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee: The European Commission’s Work Programme 2006—That the Parliament notes the European Commission’s Legislative and Work Programme for 2006 and its importance for the work of the Parliament and its committees and to Scotland.

S2M-4221 Linda Fabiani on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee: The European Commission’s Work Programme 2006—That the Parliament notes the European Commission’s Legislative and Work Programme for 2006 and its importance for the work of the Parliament and its committees and to Scotland.
